39386944.review:
ZomDay ist ein Zombie-Waveshooter, nicht mehr aber auch nicht weniger. 
Auf unterschiedlichen Maps stellen wir uns Welle um Welle verschiedenen Zombies und anderen Gegnern inklusive Endboss entgegen.
Nach einem relativ verständlichen Tutorial geht´s auch schon los.
Während uns am Anfang des Spiels lediglich eine kleine Anzahl an Waffen zur Verfügung stehen, erspielen wir uns nach und nach neue Wummen und Fähigkeiten. Und davon gibt es eine ganze Menge. Unsere erspielten Waffen verbessern sich während der Runde, je nachdem, wie oft wir sie einsetzen. Die Fähigkeiten gehen von mehr Munition, mehr Schaden/Krits bis hin zu mehr Leben, bessere/mehr Drops usw. 
Zu Beginn stehen uns eine begrenzte Anzahl an Respawns zur Verfügung, die wir aber auch im späteren Verlauf des Spiels erhöhen können. Nach jeder Welle haben wir kurz die Möglichkeit, Munition oder Waffen zu kaufen, unseren Charakter zu verbessern und Airdrops einzusammeln. 
Da wäre auch schon der erste Kritikpunkt zum Spiel. Die Wellen starten nach kurzer Zeit automatisch. Vor Allem für Neueinsteiger bleibt zwischendurch kaum Zeit, sich in Ruhe auf die nächste Welle vorzubereiten.
Das Waffenhandling ist sicher Geschmackssache. Realismus ist eher Nebensache, man kann z.B. in jeder Hand ein Maschinengewehr halten. Das Zielen selbst funktioniert sehr gut, nach erfolgreichem Combo (z.B. Headshotfolge) gibt es eine Bullettime. Sieht ganz gut aus und macht auch zwischenzeitlich Spaß.
Außerdem gibt es mittlerweile einen Mehrspielermodus, um gemeinsam mit Freunden oder Fremden über die Lobby auf Zombiejagd zu gehen.
Als Fortbewegung dienen sowohl Teleportation als auch freie Bewegung, ähnlich wie bei Raw Data können wir uns durch die Level bewegen, um etwas Abstand zu den Horden zu gewinnen.
Die Grafik ist durchaus ansehnlich und das Spiel macht einen insgesammt guten Eindruck.
Für kurzweilen Spaß zwischendurch durchaus zu Empfehlen, wenn man kein Spiel mit besonderer Tiefe erwartet.
Es gibt auch eine Demo zum Testen

Gruß Ziffi

Ziffi´s Spieletipps als Kurator: http://store.steampowered.com/curator/5837414/

38388724.review:
Bonsoir. Je viens d'acheter ce jeu étant un gros fan des jeux de zombies qui plus est en VR (j'ai le vive).
Ayant fini Arizona Sunshine ce soir (je suis un peu triste c'était un bon jeu) il me fallait un autre titre.
Je n'ai fait qu'un stage (le premier) de 6 vagues et je dois dire que ma premiére impression est trés bonne.
Les graphismes sont bons, on peut se déplacer, il y a plein de bonus et de choses à ramasser.
La jouabilité est trés bonne, l'ambiance flippante.
Les zombies sont bien faits, variés, et les quelques zombies casqués m'ont donné du fil à retordre.
Ce que j'aime dans les jeux de zombies, c'est d'être en stress, et la c'est réussi.
Côté armes, c'est trés bien fourni.
Si vous aimez vous défouler (des vagues de zombies à dégommer) c'est un titre vraiment bien.
Mon titre phare, c'est HordeZ (et surtout mon premier en VR), mais je dois avouer que celui ci a toutes les armes pour l'égaliser (peut être même le surclasser, mais je n'ai fait qu'un stage alors à voir).
La difficulté est bien croissante entre les différentes vagues, et étant resté assez statique durant les vagues (il faut se déplacer entre les vagues pour ramasser les "accessories") je me suis fait encercler à la sixiéme et ai du me sauver (comme une tata oui :)  ).
Il y avait un boss bien solide à la sixiéme vague, mais il est resté bloqué pas mal de temps sous un escalier (donc je l'ai cartonné tranquille ce qui l'a bien affaibli)
Je n'ai pas encore tout saisi, j'ai juste esssayé, et c'est mon premier commentaire sur un jeu steam, mais ce jeu m'a donné envie de vous donner mon avis.
Donc trés bon jeu à premiére vue, je fais une autre session demain, mmais si vous aimez le genre, je pense que vous ne regretterez pas.
Bonne soirée tueurs de zombies !

38013458.review:
[Using the Oculus Rift]
Alright, 22 hours in to the game, here's what I've got to say.
Super fun game. High replay value.
ZomDay offers a wide selection of guns and various skills to invest in to make different builds to use which makes every level feel different. By builds I mean this, pistol, shotgun, assault rifle, sniper ad melee. It took me about 12 hours (give or take) to max out my level being 100. Upon leveling and beating missions and challenges on various difficulties you get skill points which you can re-spec at a small cost of special tokens called snake coins. Snake coins are used to unlock new skills as well as purchase special strong weapons in a mission (which you can refund at the end of the game). So Let's say you buy a gold 1911 pistol for 6coins, you can refund it for 3. The drop rate on the coins is vey reasonable, considering you need about 100 to unlock good skills.
At level 100 I have about 300skill points (another 50 if I could beat 2 of the missions that are super hard) 
Its c0ol to invest them all in to one weapon type to make yourself feel like a tactical zombie killing beast. Kill hordes of zombies with just 2 strong as hell pistols, sweet. Blow zombies away with a semi-automatic shotgun, yeah!
The reload system is very basic, fits well for the "fast"paced frantic running youll be doing when getting away from 30 zombies. Push a button, place controller next to chest, shoot some more.

Let's lay down the pros and cons

Pro
-Wide varitey of weapons
-Great perk selection system
-Zombie hitboxes are great
-Teleportation and free movement system
-Co-op
-Charcater and weapon leveling
-Almost no game breaking bugs (Im considering one where a sandworm boss spawned from the ground and made me fall through the level... I was tight at that but that's it)

Cons
-Not many people playing co-op (When someone does join they have no idea how to do anything...PLAY THE TUTORIAL IT TEACHES YOU HOW TO RELOAD!)
-Difficulty levels are... not the best. Easy through the hardest difficulty just adds more health to zombies and more damage to you. so Hard doesnt feel so..."hard". Really if you keep moving and shooting you'll never die. (Me saying this at level 100 so this is kinda invalid)
-No way to change levels or difficulty in the hub area. Not a bad problem but if youre playing with somebody, gotta kick em out and hope they rejoin when you make a new game.
-No voice chatting with co-op partner. Would love to teach people how to reload by talking to them, not by charading the motions to them.
-Needs more content. More levels and challenges which I hope come around in the future. 

Please keep this game updated! <3

ALL IN ALL 9/10!

36461048.review:
This is pretty much a mindless zombie wave shooter.  Although, it's more of a horde mode wave shooter.  You can move around with the joystick or touchpad.  However, with the Oculus Rift you have to find out how to get into the menu option settings in under for the Rift Touch Controller to work properly (good luck with that, it involved hitting the left-hand menu button and clicking on the joystick I believe... yeah, geez!) 

I think this game is alright.  You can try out different weapons and there's a nice variety of zombies.  At the end of the waves there's a boss zombie.  It really isn't all that difficult as long as you don't drop weapons by accident.  That will happen given that the button to drop weapon is very easy to do by accident.  Good luck picking it up after that if you are playing seated (yes, you can play this game comfortable with only front sensors and seated, but if you drop  a weapon you can't really pick it up)

I think this game is meant to be played co-op.  It's a nice game, but I don't think it's all that good.  There's really not that much variety and there's limited maps.  And there's lots of graphical glitches and pathing issues.  However, for the price I can recommend, especially the sale price.

Sale Price Rating 6/10 - nice mindless zombie co-op horde shooter, if you're into that kind of thing, this game is a lot better than HordeZ that's for sure... and to the reviewer who compared this to Killing Floor: Incursion .. LOLZ

35792261.review:
打僵尸，作为VR游戏发展最快的领域，恐怖感升级，身临其境吓尿的感觉更是前所未有。

大家都在开发VR打僵尸，且难得有几款被有VR设备的玩家们挂在嘴边。

原因无他，就是千篇一律，突突突，打打打，良好游戏体验很快就被单调的玩法消磨殆尽。

当然，好玩的也有不少，比如僵死之日，国产里面算是不错的了。

————————————————————————————

VR游戏一直很看重画面质量、显示效果，游戏中的场景相对复杂，但是画面清晰度并没有因此削弱。

所以玩起来的时候，那种真实的感觉，各种光影效果，加上僵尸狰狞的面部，效果还是很明显的。

虽然心里有点怕怕的，但是进入状态之后，就像是在玩丧尸围城，各种大动作搞事情。

看介绍上说开发只有五个人，想来他们也是各种熬夜加班很辛苦，才做出游戏的，

从目前的评价和销量来看大家对他们的努力还是很认可的。

再来说它的玩法。

初玩这款VR游戏，我就想到了之前端游上的FPS打僵尸模式，升级、换钱、买装备，一堆人在那里肝肝肝。

令人意外的是，这种玩法其实也很适用于VR打僵尸。

一边打怪一边升级，在配套VR模式，既结合了时下流行的游戏玩法，还借助VR沉浸感的优势让游戏能够一个不错的表现。

人物升级，解锁更多装备，拿到技能点之后，还可以升级一些专精。

更多的装备和更多的专精选择，让我在玩得时候可以玩出各种流派，长枪流、短枪流、近战流，爆炸流。

另外再配合上游戏的评级系统，打得好分数高，补给多，经验多，打得差，挂了没事，站起来继续肝。

我觉得他们在这方面的设计还是不错的。

其次，不得不说一下游戏的射击体验。相较于无限子弹流的突突突打僵尸，僵死之日还是保留了VR游戏传统的手动换弹的。

说是手动，但也不是完全地一只手拿枪，一只手塞弹夹，而是要完成一个特定的动作，这一点，我暂时不能定义它的好坏。

不同的枪械，散射程度、暴击效果、伤害、震动反馈都不一样，这让人觉得枪械做得很到位，枪感也不错。

还有暴击效果会触发子弹时间，感觉设计还是比较巧妙的，同时触发子弹时间时视觉效果还是挺震撼的。

所以，我觉得这种游戏的整体设计，可以保证我不是玩几分钟就把游戏丢在一边，或者是打半小时就觉得累，或者无聊。

主线模式战个痛快之后，我还可以去挑战模式再肝一肝，没有多少疲惫的感觉。

当我在玩游戏的时候，我觉得自己就是个超人，什么僵尸、BOSS，非我一合之敌，哈哈

总体来说，这款VR打僵尸游戏还是很不错的，价格方面也还OK，如果觉得贵了，就等打折的时候找个基友♂一起入。

要是等不及了，那直接入手，或者找个基友♂双双入♂，我都觉得OK。

最后说一下，游戏的新手教学还是蛮不错的，内容详细，让游戏上手还是很容易的。

当然，如果你是自己就是VR老司机的话，请直接开车，别管我！

最后的最后，还是希望游戏能够坚持下去，把完整版的内容呈现给大家！
————————————————————————————————

实际上，一开始，叫我打僵尸，我是拒绝的，直到我发现了联机模式。

作为啪啪啪，哦，不，突突突高手，我身边还缺一个站着发呆，平时就喊喊666的咸鱼队友。

你要不要来试试看！

有什么意见和建议请留言告知，我要去寻找下一个好玩的VR游戏了。

34872264.review:
This game could be good, I tried really hard to see past the negatives and enjoy it, but I'm just not having as much fun with it as I should be.   

Overall, it did have some good attributes:  

Decent gun selection
Guns are satisfying to shoot
Good variety of enemies
The game doesn't look bad, not amazing, but not bad
Good price point


But my biggest con for the game is that it's just too damn difficult even on the lowest setting. The most basic zombies are bullet sponges, not to mention the higher level enemies. Add to that the fact that there are massive numbers of them, too many for the fairly small maps to hold, so they tend to move in tightly packed clusters of anywhere from 5-6 to 20+ zombies. This isn't a huge deal on the levels where you can just run away from them as you shoot, but once you get to the "defend the gate" stage it can literally turn into a dogpile that builds faster than you can kill.


Ammo is fairly scarce, even with copious use of melee weapons, the only real way to get a usable amount of it is to purchase it from the shop in between rounds, but they barely give you enough time. And finally the bosses, they're basically invincible, I get they're supposed to be stong and all, but they have no mechanics, you just kite them around and dump clip after clip after clip into them, and melee weapons are not viable, meaning if you managed your ammo poorly you have zero options.


It's not expensive, and it is pretty fun, but these issues are frustrating. overall if there were more difficulty options I would definitely recommend it, but in it's current state its not really worth playing in my opinion.

我是打折的时候入的，入了以后开始下载，结果还没下完右下角弹出通知，游戏发布了新的更新。这时是凌晨4点。

开发团队还请稍微注意下自己的肝啊


由于是抢先体验，所以目前有的评测都不可能面面俱到，鉴于开发团队也在暗中观察各种反馈，所以可能提到的问题会被解决，建议会被采纳。我就看到有好几个玩家收回了差评，包括之前有抱怨oculus无法运行的，明明这个游戏本来就是只针对VIVE开发的，但是开发组还是在看到评测后一周内更新了对oculus的支持。所以

关于游戏体验，个人感觉最受用的是射击感。枪械的碰撞与声音效果处理得很好，在空间内的射击表现也很饱满。尸潮感觉很棒，尤其子弹时间给出的特效，社保爱好者一本满足。

还没有体验过联机，但是单人体验已经很棒了，重玩性很高。这类游戏其实只有一个要求，打得爽就好。ZOMDAY做到了。

最后，非常高兴看到一款国产游戏能做的这么好，加油！

34499894.review:
讲真，当我看到这个名字和游戏LOGO，其实我是拒绝的。[b]僵[/b]？WHAT？！是不是要配句RUA?

但是，但是，在游戏的教程模式，我就被[u] M16+红点瞄准镜 [/u]圈粉了。。。[spoiler]谁让我没吃过鸡呢。。	[/spoiler]

—————————————————————————————————

游戏的玩法还是传统丧尸类FPS游戏，这个题材已经被做烂了，而且之前也不乏布鲁克海文、亚利桑亚阳光等大作，所以想要在丧尸类FPS游戏里留下好印象是非常困难的事情，但是你们也看到《僵死之日》做到了。

[h1]老戏觉得游戏最大的亮点是内容多但是不杂 [/h1]

[u] 生存模式&挑战模式 [/u]：
“生存模式”目前有三关，每关6波进攻。玩家可以购买枪支随意移动进行击杀，同时丧尸会如潮水般向玩家扑过来，缺乏经验的玩家很可能会被围死其中，但是老道的玩家却能利用这个机制很好的引怪，提高击杀效率。“挑战模式”更像是TD，中途不能购买物品，只能从空投中拾取，怪物的目标也从玩家改成了一扇大门。目前“挑战模式”只有两个地图，都是用狙击枪进行防御，不用正面面对丧尸，对胆子小的同学们会友善一点。额外补充：两种模式都支持联机，老戏也十分推荐大家体验联机模式，能很好的消除VR游戏中的孤独感。[spoiler] 能不能消除单身狗就看各位操作了。。[/spoiler]

[u] 武器升级系统&人物属性系统	[/u]：
其实这两个系统对于一款VR游戏来说非常难以驾驭的，因为一旦玩家觉得这东西你设计出来没用，或者觉得烦，很可能直接放弃这个游戏了。它需要游戏中有非常多的反馈、支持、引导，让玩家觉得我花时间去琢磨这些东西是有意义的。举个栗子：狙击枪的利弊大家都知道，在面对较多数量敌人的时候太鸡肋了，但是开发者在人物属性中添加了一个技能点——[u]狙击枪子弹穿透[/u]，它让狙击枪的子弹能击杀多个敌人，这不仅弥补了狙击枪的劣势，也让一些只喜欢玩狙的朋友倍感温暖，这是人物属性系统。武器系统则会相对简单一些，但是武器的种类实在是太多了，游戏中有一面武器枪老戏大概估算一下上面至少有20种武器，什么[u]  M16、AK47、AWP、UMP、UZI、沙鹰 [/u]全有！老戏最近沉迷吃鸡，看到AK和M16根本没抵抗力，而且模型做的又真，在PUB里没看够的同学来这里尽管看。。给你看一天。。

[u] 小兵&BOSS设定 [/u]：
游戏中的小兵现在我能记起来的还有：普通僵尸、快速僵尸、自爆僵尸、僵尸鼠、三级盔僵尸。。。肯定有遗漏的，但种类已经算不少了，有的时候还会冷不丁从你后面跳出来给你一个superise。BOSS我打了两关，最欣慰的是没有模仿或是照搬的痕迹，都是独立原创，且有各自不同的技能，生气了还都贼可怕。。跳起来揍你。。

—————————————————————————————————

游戏中还暗藏许多小惊喜，比如在生存模式第二关的二楼拐角处，竟然放着两台[u] 老虎机[/u]。。。对。。就是老虎机。。（有点过分了啊喂，脑补一下队友在被怪锤，自己在玩老虎机。。。）。又比如在挑战模式的等待大厅里，有两块黑板，上面贴着许多照片和纸条，其中的照片就是[u] 英兔工作室[/u]小伙伴的照片，连我们玩家看到都觉得非常温馨！

总的来说游戏给人整体的感觉就是用心了，用心做出来的东西跟别的一上手就能分辨出来。5个人的小团队，25号还因为一个更新加工到早上5点。

开发者和玩家之间的感动是相互的，感谢英兔的小伙伴，祝越来越好。

At the time of this review I merely had 2.3 hrs of gameplay, but I can say the following:
First, for 5.99 Euros, this is a game that should not be missing in your VR Library, so if you can still get it for that price, do not hesitate.
OK, its nothing more than a straight forward wave based Zombie shooter, but at least it has locomotion and a multiplayer option (which I did not try yet).
Graphics and gameplay are pleasant enough.
Maps are somewhat small though, which leads to alot of circular movements, that will force you to untangle those damn VR Cables after every level or sometimes even in between. Playing this game would surely be more pleasant if you own a Vive with TPCast.
Also, and i am sure I speak for the majority of VR gamers who do not suffer from an oversensitive stomach, the option to choose between teleport and free locomotion should be an industry standard by now, and the lack of it is hard to understand, since it is not something very difficult to implement.
So please devs, if you can spare a few hours, please flick that switch, you would make alot of people very happy.

这是一个姑娘打丧尸的心路历程：刚开始上手的时候，觉得时间也不够，丧尸很多，但是在慌张中打中一枪，就开始期待下次再打中。感觉节奏很紧凑，直到触发了子弹时间，觉得感受到了这款游戏的真谛。从一开始的躲躲藏藏，到举着枪托直接正面去砸僵尸的头部，从害怕正面看到丧尸，到踏着尸体捡buff。加上虚拟现实的沉浸感，觉得自己仿佛是一个勇猛无敌的人，冷静的穿梭于尸群众，淡定的准备好枪膛中的子弹，潇洒的面对庞然怪物，最终战胜了它，这种感觉是真实生活中绝对不会有的，而且这种感觉实在是太棒了~

Awesome game, like others have been saying it's similar to Killing Floor. After yesterday's update it also natively supports the oculus rift + the touch controllers. But there are a few problems  about the game that make it kind of unplayable.

[b]1.[/b] You can't pause the game whatsoever, also no way to go back to the main menu (other than dying multiple times).
[b]2.[/b] The zombies come at you really fast (in the first level already), which makes you die rather quickly in those small maps, in my opinion it should be easy to complete the level when you first start. Now it's rather difficult.
[b]3.[/b] I couldn't understand the tutorial very well, still haven't figured out how to drop a weapon, sometimes the reloading doesn't work too, which makes me die more often.

34425090.review: ZomDay is an awsome Zombie-Arena/Wave-Shooter! Controls are teleport only and the arena is two stories with multiple rooms and different layouts in each level. You need to survive several waves/rounds until a boss appears and in between there are randomly some mini-bosses. Careful aiming and not wasting ammo by spraying around is key to survival. Between each round you can buy additional ammo and weapons. After each round some boxes with ammo, money and exp are dropped but they have to be opened until the next round starts otherwise they disappear. So you need to focus on what to do between the rounds (I usually first buy necessary ammo and weapons and the collect the loot drops). Like in real life, the more you practice a certain weapon, the better you are with it (increased damage and capacity). The game tracks your level for each weapon. For me key to defeating the boss of level 2 was to get better at my favorite guns and to figure out the weak spot of the boss. These twists (the game rewards practicing, ammo/money/weapon managment is necessary and figuring out the weak spots of enemies) are what makes this game really great! I hope the developers keep up their good work and add some more levels to the final game.

34417036.review:
For €5.99 this is a bargain. I played this for a bit, and this seems quite promising. 

The gun-play is pretty much spot on as in everything works like they should.
weapon sights are clear and popping heads of zombies is easy.
They have also introduced something that I wish all the VR game devs added in their games:
Pistol-whipping and rifle butt-smashing mechanics!
This makes the game a joy to play when you are not completely helpless with an empty gun when 
a zombie drools all over your face and shoes and begins to slowly gnaw away your health.

Weapons are pretty varied and look like their real-life counterparts from wrenches to sniper rifles. 
Reloading happens by ejecting a mag with menu button and then bringing the weapon close to your body.
This works for all but the shotgun (mash menu button while holding the weapon close to body). 
This works pretty well and makes it a bit more challenging 

Movement is short-range teleporting only.

The game consists of missions which have 6 waves + boss.
Occasionally there is a supply drop that drops experience, money and ammuunition or a powerup.

The powerups drop at random and there are at least a few I have seen. Double damage, infinite ammunition, damage resistance to mention the ones I remember right away.

The enemeis are your typical undead, except for some special enemies, 
all of which have their special attacks.
So, the usual set of slow zombie, fast zombie, screaming zombie, clawed zombie, 
exploding fat zombie, exploding fat zombie with healing effect on enemies and so on, 
and a boss at the end of each level.

The only negative thing I could say is that it still has some bugs like 
sound disappearing all of the sudden, requiring a game restart.

But so far this game has been promsiing and I'd say this is worth the €5.99 price tag at the moment. I'd buy early. (Was on special promo sale when writing this)

UPDATE:
The sound issue has been found, apparently an app focus issue. 
A minor annoyance but I can live with it.

Also, the developers have been very active and engaging the community which is great to see.

34408527.review:
Yet another zombie wave shooter. Have we all not had our fill of this dated mechanic that is pumped out at the first chance of a quick buck. Apparently INTO GAMES thinks not, and I would have to agree with them.

Waves of countless zombies, endless coins, power ups, perks, pistols you name it, this games got it. And it not only has the lot, it's found a way to blend them all together into one game you will find hard to put down. Sure it's still a little rough round the edges but nothing game breaking or to deter you from having fun. With a 40% discount to get you onboard under the title Early Access is more than fair and makes up for a few short comings like mic support.

The game is based around survival, as waves of zombies enter your allocated area your forced to defend or die. After a few rounds you're rewarded with a end of level boss to defeat and a new area to defend. With a total of only 4 levels in current state and more on the way you will find yourself neck deep in zombie guts before you know it. The zombies look great and are varied quite a bit with the promise of more. Perks and gun purchases keep you coming back for one more round. It's all so well put together. It's just great arcade fun. You would be missing out on a real gem if you didn't grab it at the discounted price. But don't trust me trust the other 90plus positive reviews.

Hope to see you all in the game!

34408217.review:
It's essentially a chinese version of Killing Floor 2 in VR. I love it. The game runs perfectly on an Oculus Rift(the hands are awkwardly aligned, but the guns and melee weapons are perfectly fine as-is). If you run the game in Windows 7 compatibility mode, you can avoid the spawning in the ground glitch that occurs on Oculus.

Overall though, for $5, get this fucking game. It's simply too much value to pass up at this price. To be honest, I've had more fun with this game than Killing Floor: Incursion or Arizona Sunshine already. And it costs 5 fucking dollars. 

Seriously, if you're not throwing money at the screen right now and playing this game, you're doing yourself a disservice. It runs good. It looks amazing. It's challenging! It has decent gunplay mechanics, good weapon variety, a level up and loot system, and online co-op.

34373838.review:
fun, cheap, worth it

Its wave-based on three maps with a boss for each. You have character progression through exp and skills, as well as weapon progression in terms of them getting better as you use them. There's also a lot of difficutly choices though I've only tried hte easiest 'normal' so far. I've tried two of the bosses so far, pretty good though the second one got a bit tedious in terms of how much raw damage it takes. But still good and provides structure to the game that would otherwise just be endless waves. 

Feels a lot like COD Zombies in VR, with some notable changes. Hope to see more people in co-op!

Would like the co-op to be improved a bit - player avatars seemed really twitchy, though that could be ping I only had two rounds with other players so far. If you play co-op and someone joins mid-way through your game, you need to buy them weapons or theyll probably just die straight away. If you can share/coordinate its not a problem, but if one player just eats up all the ammo drops and cash then the other will be in a tough spot. I can't tell if there's VOIP, if not there should be. And it would be nice if you could bank cash between maps/games, seems you either use it during that map and its gone. And lastly the game needs a menu/option to quit the game. 



All that said, its good and worth the price. Hope the devs make some updates to make it even better

34350399.review:
A discapito del nome poco felice e del prezzo ridotto, Zomday non risulta l’ennesimo gioco-farsa per realtà virtuale “made in China” di scarsa fattura e magari zeppo di finte recensioni positive di utenti con solo un gioco in catalogo. Nonostante il VR sia già invaso, per non dire inflazionato, dai giochi con zombie il titolo si distingue per tutta una serie di elementi.

HordeZ, uno dei primi giochi con supporto VR su Steam, è un ottimo parallelo per Zomday. Al posto del movimento su binari, qui si ha un buon teletrasporto pressoché identico a quello di Arizona Sunshine (altro titolo del genere zombie) ma dei livelli sostanzialmente di dimensioni simili. Rispetto a Hordez tuttavia la pulizia visiva è molto maggiore, ci sono tantissime armi da utilizzare e da sbloccare, un sistema di crescita del personaggio e di acquisto di armi, nonché abbondanti dropout (bonus rilasciati dai nemici sconfitti) in pieno stile coin-op, con decine di oggetti da raccogliere man mano che si prosegue. Non manca il supporto per il multiplayer cooperativo, e dei boss davvero tosti che richiedono una miriade di proiettili per essere messi giù.

Rispettivamente al prezzo di vendita, è indubbiamente tra i più ricchi e ben dotati giochi per realtà virtuale su Steam in questo momento. Resta uno sparatutto ad ondate, quindi io non lo paragonerei a produzioni più elaborate come Dead Effect 2, Arizona Sunshine o fuoriuscendo dal tema zombie Gunheart, ma parliamo anche di giochi dal costo più elevato.

Stilisticamente, piuttosto che sottolineare atmosfera e tensione, Zomday punta molto sulla carneficina. Gli zombie sono dettagliati e anche ben animati, ma non orrifici e direi anche piuttosto ridicoli nel loro incedere spedito e disarticolato, e con molti cliché tipici dei FPS come l’unità esplosiva o quella urlante. Ciò in cui il gioco primeggia è nel numero, sarete continuamente circondati da assembramenti di mostri che vi staranno pressoché attaccati, questo è forse il miglior esempio di “calca” per realtà virtuale disponibile senza perdere troppo nel dettaglio ravvicinato.

34335616.review:
I honestly didn't expect a lot when I saw the game costs only 9,99€ (currently 5,99€ in sale) and got suprised by how good it actually is and how much it has to offer for this price tag!

Currently there is a tutorial and three maps to play on. You have to fight multiple waves and a boss at the end. At the end of every wave you can purchase new ammo, guns or unlock skills. A lot of guns need a higher level to unlock so you need a bit of time to unlock them all.

The game has some great features like the possibility to hit zombies with the stock of your gun. Also melee weapons will do more damage the harder you hit the zombies with your motion controller!
When you manage to get some consecutive critical hits the game will be in slow motion for a while which is really satisfying as there is a lot of blood and splatter. I also have to mention the loud and powerful gun sounds.

ZomDay looks quite good (for a VR game) and also runs really smooth with 1.5x supersampling on high end hardware even when there's a lot of blood and splatter on the screen.

The only things I can complain about is that there is only teleport movement at the moment which also makes it quite easy to beat bosses. Also you can't manually reload guns which I always loved in other VR games.

All in all ZomDay is a satisfying wave shooter with quite a good amount of progression and content for the price!
I can recommend it to all HMD owners who like games like Killing Floor or COD Zombies.

34331937.review:
ゾンビ＋ハクスラ＋VRはDead effect 2で散々ハマったので購入しました
見た目はシンプルで粗削りなゲームですが、戦略的に動かないと詰みます
以下要点を箇条書きで
・基本的にはワープ移動しながら銃と斧などでゾンビを蹴散らすwave制のシューター
・経験値獲得によるレベル上げとポイントでその他の能力を上げるperkあり
・現在ステージ数は本編３つチャレンジ２つの合計５つでそれぞれ難易度は４段階
・プレイ時間はソロだと１ステージにつき３０～４０分と長すぎる（これが地味に辛い）
・武器は初期装備が決まっていて、ステージ中に稼いだお金で強い武器を買う
・稼いだお金は次に持ち越すことができない
・でもお金を入れればどんどん貯まっていく謎の募金箱がある
・武器はアンロックされるごとに増えていく、種類も豊富
・マルチは２人協力プレイのみ
・ヘッドショットを連発でキメるといわゆるバレットタイムとなる
・撃ちすぎると弾薬切れるが戦闘中にいつでも買える（殴られないように買う）
・一定時間無敵、弾無限、一撃必殺、攻撃２倍などなどバフアイテムを敵が落とす
・ゲームオーバーは基本３回までぽい（♥の数だけ復活）
・ドロップアイテムは一定時間経過すると消える
・よって戦闘中常に休む暇なし（ポーズボタンもない？）

ザコと比べるとボスがとんでもなく硬かったり敵が引っかかって動けなくなっていたりと
バグやゲームバランスの悪さこそありますが
値段も良心的ですし普通に楽しいので総合的には今後の期待も込めてオススメです

34327233.review:
受邀在上架前几天进入了游戏，本来听到国产并没有抱太大的希望....但是
进入游戏后发现这个国内小团队做的游戏在画面上彻底秒杀了大部分VR游戏，说是国内VR应用TOP1一点都不过分，画质直逼阳光！
游戏是在小场景内可自由移动来进行收集掉落的弹药并且尽可能的在尸潮中活下来。
听起来好像很老套，没错，类似概念的VR游戏从去年就开始出了不少了。但是这款游戏让人玩的停不下来。总觉得整个人被吸进去彻底沉迷其中直到狗带..

回到正题，游戏优缺点
优点：
画质非常给力（VR总最顶级画质)
蜜汁优化，画质做成这样却流程到不可思议，毫无任何卡顿和掉帧....
可升级，可购买枪械，可自定义角色技能，可玩老虎机(败家慎重)

缺点：
游戏中长枪无法双手持握，因此硬核向玩家的体验度会略有下降。

游戏主打一个“爽”字，因此追求硬核真实的玩家买之前考虑下，不过这游戏感觉有毒，作为一名只玩硬核沙盒向的玩家接触游戏后就停不下来了......

附上一个视频 https://www.bilibili.com/video/av13369221/

34316172.review:
这是我目前玩到最好玩的一款国产VR游戏没有之一，良心的制作团队在短短的一周多的内测时间内就根据玩家反馈更新了5次游戏，修复了不少BUG。

僵死之日-超详细新手教程：https://www.bilibili.com/video/av13494628/
第一关实况：https://www.bilibili.com/video/av13171230/
第二个双人联机实况：https://www.bilibili.com/video/av13252613/

游戏的画面出奇的好，我1070显卡开最高画质还能开1.4的超级采样。画面溜到不行
游戏中有不少彩蛋需要玩家去慢慢发觉，比如饿团外卖，第一关BOSS胸口是一个日本女优的名字。

目前游戏有两个模式，故事模式和挑战模式
故事模式：就是防御僵死的攻击，玩法和阳光的尸潮类似不过不是无限的，最后一关会出现终极BOSS
                 游戏难度越高，怪物种类越多血量越厚，需要防御的波数也会增加，不过获得的收益也会倍增。
挑战模式：顾名思义就是完成特定的挑战，目前是用狙击防守大门，如果大门被攻破就GAMEOVER了。

游戏养成系统
游戏人物是有等级的，你等级越高，生命值就越高还能解锁不同的武器。
武器也有升级系统，武器使用得越多武器就会升级，影响武器的伤害和但容量。

游戏内的道具
游戏里面有金币，经验，蛇币（紫色的稀有道具币），弹药，BUFF。
所有物品都会在击杀僵死时随机掉落
金币用来购买枪支和弹药，经验用于角色升级，蛇币可在商店购买特殊道具。
每一波打完后会有空投补给，会随机掉落各种道具，金色箱子小概率出现，掉落的物品也非常丰厚。
大金币：玩过三目童子的朋友应该不陌生，就是你攻击金币就会越变越大，大金币只有10秒的攻击时间，金币最大变1W5。

BUFF
无敌BUFF：（盾牌上一个骷髅的标志）10秒内免疫所以伤害
双倍伤害：（骷髅加两把刀的标志）10秒内武器伤害翻倍
一击必杀：（骷髅加消防斧的标志）10秒内能所有僵死一枪必死，对BOSS无效
无限子弹：（骷髅加半圈子弹的图标）10秒内武器开火不消耗弹药
子弹时间：连续击中五次头部触发，触发后有一段CD

双人联机
由于制作组经费紧张，所以目前只有双人联机，目前还没有语音

支持正版，支持国产
